## PuzzleState.hasValue() method

Determines if some cell has an assigned value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hasValue(id: CellId): boolean;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

[CellId](./ts-sudoku-lib.cellid.md)


</td><td>

The [id](./ts-sudoku-lib.cellid.md) of the cell to be tested.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the cell has a value, `false` if the cell is empty or invalid.
